mainDescription: Claim Request is a powerful platform designed to streamline claim processing with speed, transparency, and efficiency. Our system enables users to easily submit, track, and manage their claims while ensuring secure data handling and seamless approval workflows.
subDescription: With an intuitive interface and automated processes, Claim Request simplifies complex claim submissions, reduces paperwork, and accelerates resolution timesâ€”empowering organizations and individuals to focus on what truly matters.

faqData.question: How do I create a claim request?
faqData.answer: You can create a claim request by logging in and selecting 'Create Request'. Fill in the necessary details and submit for review.

faqData.question: How long does it take to process my request?
faqData.answer: Claims are usually reviewed within 3-5 business days.

faqData.question: Can I track my claim status?
faqData.answer: Yes! You can track your claim status in the 'Claim History' section of your account.

faqData.question: Who approves my claim request?
faqData.answer: Your claim request is approved by a designated approver, typically a Project Manager (PM), Business Unit Leader (BUL), or Finance department.

faqData.question: What happens if my claim is rejected?
faqData.answer: If your claim is rejected, you will receive a notification with a reason for rejection. You may update and resubmit the request if necessary.

faqData.question: How will I know when my claim is paid?
faqData.answer: Once your claim is approved and processed by Finance, the status will be updated to 'Paid'. You will also receive an email confirmation.

faqData.question: Can I cancel a claim request after submission?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can cancel a claim request if it has not yet been approved. Once approved, cancellation is no longer possible.

faqData.question: What should I do if my claim is stuck in 'Pending'?
faqData.answer: If your claim is pending for an extended period, you can contact your approver or Finance department for assistance.

faqData.question: Who should I contact for technical support?
faqData.answer: For technical issues, contact our support team at support@claimrequest.com or call (+84) 987 654 321.
